LanguageData.MedicalTendSpeed.label: 看護・速度
LanguageData.MedicalTendSpeed.description: 怪我や病気を、医者として看護するときの速度です。
LanguageData.MedicalTendQuality.label: 看護・品質
LanguageData.MedicalTendQuality.description: 医者として、患者に与えられる看護の品質です。
LanguageData.MedicalOperationSpeed.label: 医療・処置速度
LanguageData.MedicalOperationSpeed.description: 治療処置を行う速度です。
LanguageData.MedicalSurgerySuccessChance.label: 外科手術の成功率
LanguageData.MedicalSurgerySuccessChance.description: The chance that a character will perform surgery successfully. The success chance is also affected by the bed and area of the operation, medicine used, and the difficulty of the surgery.
